resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82082</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82082</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4590</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How Tone Creates Reality</string>
            <string language="es">Observación para ver cómo los tonos crean la realidad</string>
            <string language="ga">Conas a Chruthaíonn Ton Réadúlacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Ton Wirklichkeit Erstellt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment La Tonalité Crée La Réalité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como O Tom Cría A Realidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come Il Tono Crea La Realtà</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς ο τόνος δημιουργεί την πραγματικότητα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Information and images illustrating the difference that tone or shading can make to a drawing, particularly if a more realistic drawing is desired.</string>
            <string language="es">La información y las imágenes ilustran la diferencia que un tono o sombra puede producir en un dibujo, sobre todo si se desea un dibujo más realista.</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolas agus íomhánna a léiríonn an difríocht ar féidir le ton nó scáthú a dhéanamh le líníocht, go háirithe má theastaíonn líníocht níos réadúla.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Art</string>
            <string language="es">Arte</string>
            <string language="ga">Ealaíon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen und Bilder, die den Unterschied 
veranschaulichen, die tonen, oder das Schattieren zu einer Zeichnung 
bilden kann, besonders wenn eine realistischere Zeichnung gewünscht 
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information et images illustrant la différence
qui modifient la tonalité ou ombrager peut faire à un schéma, en 
particulier si un schéma plus réaliste est désiré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação e imagens que ilustram a diferença 
que tone ou proteger pode fazer a um desenho, particularmente se um 
desenho mais realístico é desejado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni ed immagini che illustrano la 
differenza che modificano o proteggere può fare ad un'illustrazione, 
specialmente se un'illustrazione più realistica è voluta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι πληροφορίες και οι εικόνες που επεξηγούν τη διαφορά
που τονίζουν ή σκιάζοντας μπορούν να κάνουν σε ένα σχέδιο, 
ιδιαίτερα εάν ένα ρεαλιστικότερο σχέδιο επιδιώκεται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kunst</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
